NATIONAL INTEGRATED MATERNAL AND PERINATAL CARE GUIDELINES FOR SOUTH AFRICA 
Chapter 25: GUIDELINES FOR PERINATAL REVIEW MEETINGS 
The PNRM is a key component of the broader audit process that aims at improving the quality of perinatal care and 
perinatal outcomes.
